```{r}
# rMaps
# CA Counties: heatmap of 2007-2011
# CA:          individual years 1999-2011
# Country:     heatmap of 2007-2011 (or individual years 1999-2011)
# 
# 
# dygraphs
# CA Counties: nothing
# CA:          time series 2007-2011 (or 1999-2011)
# Country:     time series 2007-2011 (or 1999-2011)

library(rMaps)
library(dplyr)
library(maps)
data(state)
states <- state.name

cancer_data <- read.table('BYAREA.TXT', 
                          sep = '|',
                          header = TRUE,
                          stringsAsFactors = FALSE)

cancer <- cancer_data %>%
  filter(SITE == 'All Cancer Sites Combined',
         EVENT_TYPE == 'Incidence',
         AREA %in% states,
         YEAR != '2007-2011',
         RACE == 'All Races',
         SEX == 'Male and Female',
         COUNT != '~',
         COUNT != '-',
         COUNT != '.') %>%
  select(AREA, COUNT, YEAR)

cancer$COUNT <- as.numeric(cancer$COUNT) / 10000
cancer$YEAR  <- as.integer(cancer$YEAR)
cancer$AREA  <- state.abb[match(cancer$AREA, state.name)]

ichoropleth(COUNT ~ AREA, 
            data = cancer, 
            animate = "YEAR", 
            play = TRUE, 
            pal = 'Reds')
```
